div.p: P.S.W.- Acquired funding, conducted field work, collected data, and wrote manuscript. J.A.D.- Assisted with field work, speleothem preparation, and sampling. Provided critical feedback. J.F.B.- Provided logistical support for field work. C.S.- Conducted petrographic study and overlooked stable isotope analyses. Provided critical feedback. S.J.F.- Assisted with field work. Provided critical feedback. L.R.E.- Assisted with U-Th dating. J.L.K.- Assisted with field work.
